info.name: express-demo-store API
info.description:
API running on localhost:5000

This collection contains sample requests for [express-demo-store](https://github.com/demetreades/express-demo-store)

Environmental variables are included in the Collection folder

response.name: get all products
response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "total": 5,

header.warning: This is a duplicate header and will be overridden by the Content-Type header generated by Postman.

request.description: Deletes an existing product by its id

item.name: get all orders by user id

request.description: Gets all orders from a user by its id

response.name: get all orders by user id

request.description: Gets an order by its id
Updates an existing order by its id
Deletes an existing order by its id
Authenticates a user by its email and password
Gets an existing user by its id
Deletes an existing user by its id
